overview: Kenna watches the news streaming live from her cellphone, a tornado is making its way to her subdivision.  Brianne runs in the house and looks for her stepsister, "Kenna!  Kenna!"  "I'm in here," Kenna replies, and the girls watch the news on the cellphone until the reception goes down.  Kenna and Brianne run into the closet, it's the only wall in the home with two load-bearing walls, "it's safe," Kenna tells a fearful Brianne.  Brianne worries that she will pass away from this world as a virgin!  Kenna tries to calm Brianne, "you can't change fate."  Brianne knows better, she looks at her beautiful step-sister and she has always wanted her.  "Can I kiss you?"  Kenna looks at Brianne in surprise.
title: Twister
